entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Friday 31 March 2023
